org.springframework.web.socket.server.support

Class WebSocketHttpRequestHandler

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.springframework.web.socket.server.support.WebSocketHttpRequestHandler
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    HttpRequestHandler

    public class WebSocketHttpRequestHandler
extends Object
implements HttpRequestHandler
    A HttpRequestHandler for processing WebSocket handshake requests.

    This is the main class to use when configuring a server WebSocket at a specific URL. It is a very thin wrapper around a HandshakeHandler and a WebSocketHandler instance also adapting the HttpServletRequest and HttpServletResponse to ServerHttpRequest and ServerHttpResponse respectively.

    Since:
    4.0
    Author:
    Rossen Stoyanchev
